title: Customs not starting. Stuck in a non-existent custom...
body:
UPDATE: almost 10 mins later it's fixed.

Went to test some jungler stuff in a custom and after 3 minutes waiting for "game starting", me and a friend tried to dodge...
 
 We are now stuck after 2 client restarts in a non-existent game that we cannot reconnect to.

 EDIT: Have tried to login on main account several times without fail. Clicking "reconnect" does nothing. 

 Logged into smurf and created a custom without problem... Main account as well as friends accounts still locked...
